error.message: Call to deprecated function entity_load(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the entity type storage's load() method.
Call to deprecated function entity_load(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the entity type storage's load() method.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Call to deprecated function db_select(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call select() on it. For example,

Call to deprecated function db_select(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call select() on it. For example,
Call to deprecated function entity_load(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use the entity type storage's load() method.

Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\workflow_moderation\ParamConverter\EntityRevisionConverter::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.

Call to deprecated function db_merge(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container and call merge() on it. For example,

Call to deprecated function db_table_exists(). Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Instead, get a database connection injected into your service from the container, get its schema driver, and call tableExists() on it. For example,
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to workflow_moderation.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
